SqlConnectionIPAddressPreferenceNetfx.summary: Specifies a value for IP address preference during a TCP connection.
SqlConnectionIPAddressPreferenceNetfx.remarks: If Multi Subnet Failover or Transparent Network IP Resolution is set to true, this setting has no effect.

SqlConnectionIPAddressPreference.summary: Specifies a value for IP address preference during a TCP connection.
SqlConnectionIPAddressPreference.remarks: If Multi Subnet Failover is set to true, this setting has no effect.

IPv4First.summary: Connects using IPv4 address(es) first. If the connection fails, try IPv6 address(es), if provided. This is the default value.

IPv6First.summary: Connect using IPv6 address(es) first. If the connection fails, try IPv4 address(es), if available.

UsePlatformDefault.summary: Connects with IP addresses in the order the underlying platform or operating system provides them.
